name: Whirlwind Attack
prerequisiteFormula: @dex_score >= 13 AND @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:combat_expertise AND @feat:dodge AND @feat:mobility AND @feat:spring_attack AND @bab >= 4
descriptionText: You can strike out at every foe within reach.
benefitText: When you use the full-attack action, you can give up your regular attacks and instead make one melee attack at your highest base attack bonus against each opponent within reach. You must make a separate attack roll against each opponent. When you use the Whirlwind Attack feat, you also forfeit any bonus or extra attacks granted by other feats, spells, or abilities.
